about_the_game:
The Cloudpunk Original Soundtrack features over 105 minutes of music composed exclusively for the game. The soundtrack was composed by Harry Critchley.
A unique cyberpunk genre driven score seamlessly blending warm analog synthesis with sweeping cinematic melodies, capturing the many different moods & atmospheres of Nivalis.

All tracks available in both MP3 and FLAC formats.
